entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
